triples.name: Silhouette (clustering)
triples.relevance: The paper directly applies silhouette score as the core metric for evaluating clustering quality and determining optimal cluster numbers.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Clustering is the primary data analysis technique that the paper focuses on improving through cluster quality assessment.

triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: The paper applies silhouette score evaluation to k-means, a fundamental clustering algorithm, to determine optimal k values.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Clustering is presented as an important phase in data mining, providing context for the research contribution.

triples.name: Scatter plot
triples.relevance: The paper uses scatter plots as a visualization technique alongside silhouette scores to validate clustering results.

triples.name: Scikit-learn
triples.relevance: The paper specifically uses Scikit-learn's silhouette score implementation for evaluating clustering quality.
